features: 🪛 Fun DIY Kits for Kids: A build a car kit that allows children to learn how to use a screwdriver and complete a fun toy. Complete woodworking kit includes all wood parts, screws, screwdriver, and sticker set.
👦 Tons of Fun, Together: Our craft kits are designed to teach kids how to follow instructions and build with an older sibling, friend, or parent. Perfect for teaching basic motor skills.

🏁 How It Works: Just open the package and build your own car. Start with the first steps to assemble wood project followed by applying stickers and you are done! Features moving wheels for play. Build time varies from 20-45 mins.
🎨 Unleash Your DIY: Add your own acrylic paint for even more customization. Use your creativity by adding paint and the included stickers. Paint not included.
🎁 The Perfect Gift for Kids: Little Jupiter kids arts and crafts kits make a great gift for birthdays, holidays, Christmas, Hanukkah, & more! Perfect for ages 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, & more.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Little Jupiter Wood Craft Sets. The Perfect DIY for Kids Looking for the perfect activity that teaches at the same time? Look no further! Our DIY wood race car sets. A perfect all in one kit for children! Kids DIY Crafts teach kids basic motor skills and develop a sense of accomplishment! Our stem toys for kids help develop attention focus, achievement, and more. Little Jupiter has the most perfect wooden building kits. They provide hours of fun for kids while teaching how to follow instructions, using hardware to assemble, and application of decals. How Does It Work? Open the kit to reveal a diagram for the assembly of various wood pieces. Each assemble with basic phillipshead screws. Includes a small screwdriver and predrilled holes for easy assembly. Designed For Children. Build It Together Children 4-6 are recommended to assemble with an older sibling (over 7 years), older friend, parent, or grandparent. After assembly, you can apply the cool stickers for a super tricked out look! A great activity for after school, on rainy/snow days, holidays, and more! Looking for more fun? Check out our other craft sets for kids. Various kits include diamond art, pom pom art, and more! Fun for the whole family. A True "Do It Yourself" Kit for Kids Our wooden kits can be painted with your own acrylic paint. Paint not included. Parents will love to see what they can create with paint and the included sticker set.

The Little Jupiter Story Little Jupiter was started in 2018 by a married couple based out of the San Francisco Bay Area. We produce all sorts of kids related products from stuffed animals to pajamas and more! There's no limit for Little Jupiter. We strive to make the awesome & safe products all parents and children will enjoy.

Pom Pom Art Set (3pcs) (Lion, Dinosaur, & Shark) Pom Pom Art Set (3pcs) (Cat, Unicorn, Rainbow) Diamond Art Set 7 1/8" x 7 1/8" Diamond Art Magnets (6pcs) Diamond Art Bracelets (8pcs) Diamond Art Christmas Ornament & Magnets Number of Art Pieces Included 3 3 1 6 6 6 Recommended Age Range 3-5 3-5 6-12 6-12 6-12 6-12 Craft Category Paper Paper Diamond Art Diamond Art Diamond Art Diamond Art Project Type Paper Craft with Pom Poms Paper Craft with Pom Poms Art Canvas Magnets Bracelets Magnets or Ornaments Perfect for Multiple Children ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Diy monster tuck and race car
reviews.reviewText: My son loves it he had so much building these today

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Thisw was very fun to build with my son who’s 5

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this because my son has been loving putting things together to play with lately. When it arrived I was a little nervous because the box was so small. I was thinking that it was going to be thin and really breakable. When I got the box open it was actually a good size in thickness and everything. There is a screw driver, screws and even stickers to put on when done. It was fairly simple for him to do with some help and he uses it everyday.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fun build-and-play toy
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my 5-year-old son who loves building projects and toy vehicles. We had previously done a similar DIY wooden monster truck and it was such a fun project to do together - I was excited to find the car version. The kit was complete, it came with the wooden pieces, screws, a little screwdriver, and stickers for decoration. The instructions seemed straightforward and the assembly was fairly easy. My son did need some help lining up the screws and doing the last bit of tightening of the screws but otherwise managed to do most of it himself.For some reason though, it didn't quite come together the way I think it was supposed to... once everything was together I realized that the center body of the car was lower than the sides. It still looks good; we honestly didn't even notice it was different from the picture until we went to put on the stickers and realized that the longer ones didn't quite fit since the hood and back of the car are not totally flat. I suppose we could disassemble it and see if there is another way to put it together, but we followed the pre-drilled holes so I'm not sure if it will make a difference. It's not a huge issue as my son is still having a blast playing with it and it still rolls nicely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Quality control issues, inspect before giving to children
reviews.reviewText: The concept is sound. The age suggestion is appropriate. The quality control is poor. There is nothing more frustrating than getting a kid excited about a project and the kit being flawed. I was missing a part. Fortunately I could make a replacement at the time it was being constructed. But this kit is also made of three parts that are all supposed to fit flush with each other. They did not. The screwdriver provided works, barely. The handle is to small for proper leverage. The stickers are not strong enough to stay stuck to bare wood. If i did not have access to my shop this project would have been dissatisfying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Holiday Craft
reviews.reviewText: I selected this DIY wooden car craft to emulate the idea of toy making for elves at a Christmas sleepover. I love that the kit comes with all the necessary essentials and the customization stickers were such a fun way to complete the project. My little ones definitely felt like they got to step into Santa’s workshop by creating their very own toy car. It was simple to follow instructions and the completed toy was adorable. I would recommend to others for hands on activities for their little ones, nothing beats the feeling of accomplishment once they’ve constructed their very own toy. 🏎️ this would also make a great gift to any little builder or car lover.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my son to help teach him to read instructions and learn how to put together. Simple model. As far as the instructions go, they are easy to follow. The kit includes everything needed: wooden parts, screws, mini screwdriver, and stickers. Everything went together nicely, although some screws were a bit difficult for my son to put in (not enough strength to turn the screws). The car is made from a lightweight solid wood and the wheels still turn. Overall, a nice kit for a child wanting to learn how to build a model.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So much fun!
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my son. He’s almost 2 and he is such a car boy. So I figured I’d get him one he can build and decorate. I know he can’t paint it the best but I know he’d had so much fun either way. I haven’t put it together yet because I’m saving it as a birthday present but I did make sure to check it out and it’s pretty good quality and I definitely think it is worth the money!
